name: Skelly is mad!
description:
Skelly is mad!

The Apocalypse is here! The demons have attacked Skellys town where he rested in peace. Now Skelly is mad!
Find the Dark Horseman of the Apocalypse and send him back to hell!

HOW TO PLAY:
Move with mouse movement

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
Click once: Revolver
Double click: Shotgun
Hold: Rifle

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
Hold: Aim and Keep move direction

Since I run out of time to add a credits screen in my game to meet the deadline for the MiniJam66, here are the links to all the assets I used. A big thank you to all the artists below!!!

Credits:

https://novely.itch.io/character-skinless-yarik - Novely

https://openpixelproject.itch.io/opp2017village - Open Pixel Project

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack - Kenney

https://finalbossblues.itch.io/halloween-graphics - finalbossblues
